de.jannlab.training

Class GradientDescent

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.jannlab.training.NetTrainer
      • de.jannlab.training.GradientDescent

  • public final class GradientDescent
extends NetTrainer
    This class implements the common gradient descent learning algorithm.

    Author:
    Sebastian Otte
